rev.diff:
Line 246: Line 246:
On April 25, 2011 on [[Anderson Cooper 360]] on [[CNN]], Trump said he wanted Obama to end the issue by releasing a long-form Certificate of Live Birth (distinct from the short-form Certification of Live Birth – Hawaii's prima facie evidence of birth).<ref>{{cite web|title= Obama's Birth Certificate |url= http://urbanlegends.about.com/od/barackobama/a/obama_birth_certificate.htm |last=Emery |first=David |work=About.com |date=March 30, 2011 |accessdate=April 26, 2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|title= Birtherism: Where It All Began|url= http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0411/53563_Page3.html |work=The Politico |date=April 22, 2011 |accessdate=April 25, 2011}}</ref> Trump received criticism from both the political right and left in the media for his stance.<ref name=Politico33011>{{Cite news|last=Haberman |first=Maggie |title=Bill O'Reilly pounds birther Donald Trump |url=http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0311/52271.html |date=March 30, 2011|work=Polico.com|separator=,|postscript=|accessdate=April 13, 2011}}</ref>On April 27, 2011 the long-form of Obama's birth certificate was released by the White House. In a briefing, Obama said it should put the matter to rest, and that nation had more important issues demanding attention.<ref>[http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/04/27/obama-birth-certificate-r_n_854248.html Obama Birth Certificate Released By White House (PHOTO)].''Huffington Post'' April 27, 2011. Retrieved May 8, 2011.</ref>
On April 25, 2011 on [[Anderson Cooper 360]] on [[CNN]], Trump said he wanted Obama to end the issue by releasing a long-form Certificate of Live Birth (distinct from the short-form Certification of Live Birth – Hawaii's prima facie evidence of birth).<ref>{{cite web|title= Obama's Birth Certificate |url= http://urbanlegends.about.com/od/barackobama/a/obama_birth_certificate.htm |last=Emery |first=David |work=About.com |date=March 30, 2011 |accessdate=April 26, 2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|title= Birtherism: Where It All Began|url= http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0411/53563_Page3.html |work=The Politico |date=April 22, 2011 |accessdate=April 25, 2011}}</ref> Trump received criticism from both the political right and left in the media for his stance.<ref name=Politico33011>{{Cite news|last=Haberman |first=Maggie |title=Bill O'Reilly pounds birther Donald Trump |url=http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0311/52271.html |date=March 30, 2011|work=Polico.com|separator=,|postscript=|accessdate=April 13, 2011}}</ref>On April 27, 2011 the long-form of Obama's birth certificate was released by the White House. In a briefing, Obama said it should put the matter to rest, and that nation had more important issues demanding attention.<ref>[http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/04/27/obama-birth-certificate-r_n_854248.html Obama Birth Certificate Released By White House (PHOTO)].''Huffington Post'' April 27, 2011. Retrieved May 8, 2011.</ref>
â
Trump expressed pride at his role in the release of the long-form certificate in a press conference followup.<ref>[http://www.cbsnews.com/8301-503544_162-20057854-503544.html Trump takes credit for Obama birth certificate release, but wonders "is it real?"] CBS News April 27, 2011. Retrieved May 9, 2011.</ref> On May 9, Trump denied the allegations against him, stating "I am the least racist person in the world"
+
Trump expressed pride at his role in the release of the long-form certificate in a press conference followup.<ref>[http://www.cbsnews.com/8301-503544_162-20057854-503544.html Trump takes credit for Obama birth certificate release, but wonders "is it real?"] CBS News April 27, 2011. Retrieved May 9, 2011.</ref> On May 9, Trump denied the allegations against him, stating "I am the least racist person in the world".<ref>[http://latimesblogs.latimes.com/washington/2011/05/donald-trump-isnt-a-racist-because-a-black-man-won-the-apprentice-once.html LA Times]</ref>
